system.descriptionText: Can ignore most Difficult Terrain such as Rockslides, Tank Traps, Fallen Trees, etc, counting them as open ground. Can't Ram, makes Charge Action instead. Can turn as a Free Action, and do so as many times as they like while moving, turning itself doesn't count as movement. Can also Parry if equipped with a melee weapon.
